description:
In this video training, you will learn everything you need to know to present yourself professionally on a video webinar. We will cover the minimum hardware and software requirements, setup and configuration, professional lighting, and video production basics.

You can look professional on your webinars without spending thousands of dollars on equipment and dedicating a room for a studio!

What are the most common mistakes in video webinars, and how to avoid them? After taking this course and implementing the principles, you will be able to create one of the best looking webinars on the internet - Guaranteed!

What equipment should you buy? I have researched and tested countless products to determine which camera, microphone, lights, and stands are best for an in-home or in-office webinar studio. My goal was inexpensive, easy to use, portable, but with professional results.

How long will it take to learn this? Time is money! I designed this course with SHORT, CONCENTRATED videos so you can get in, learn the content, and get back to work! My goal was to deliver the most value in the least time.

I designed this course for the savvy professional webinar producer who is ready to increase their expert image, but doesn't want to spend the time or financial investment to set up a dedicated permanent video studio.

Thanks for checking out my course; be sure to watch the free previews below. Enroll in the class today to activate this powerful training and take your web presence from average to a Studio-Pro!
title: Make your webinars look better than 95% of your competition
